channel.title: Awards Mod Edit?
channel.description:
Awards
im just wanting to know what can i do or could you give me a version that has my needs
ive got the mode Stars And Badges (aka stars) but it comes up like
Administrator STARS then Badge Badge
but on this site you click on the name it just shows position how do i edit it or can you guys send me edited link thanks, Drop A Whip

item.title: Awards Mod Edit?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:6, topic:216330”]Should PM really as this is not the correct section for such a topic.

The other question you have to ask yourself, is whether the time and effort is worth it?.. does your community have any chance of surviving what-so-ever.[/quote]
wow negativity to the limit there greeny

Read full topic

item.title: Awards Mod Edit?
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Oh dear. I think I’m trying to emulate moparscape/mitb with rsbot.com. Hopefully mitb with fewer noobs.

I used “Member Awards 1.0.2” with a hack to load the awards into the userprofile array and another to the template that displays the thread to get them to appear next to the name.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I guess you’re wanting to make your own Moparscape site? Good for you.

item.title: Awards Mod Edit?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:4, topic:216330”]Well, I shouldn’t be doing this, because we’re not an smf support site, but I’m feeling courteous today.

If you’re trying to emulate the badge system we have here, I think you’ve got the wrong mod installed.

You say you have “Stars And Badges (aka stars)”, the actual mod we have here is called “Show Multiple Badges (AKA Stars)”, and the link is here.

You’ll have to hack it around a bit, it’s an older mod, but there’s a push in the right direction.[/quote]yes osrry thats the mod i have i dont have a clue how to edit i really need moparisthebest’s help

Read full topic

item.title: Awards Mod Edit?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Well, I shouldn’t be doing this, because we’re not an smf support site, but I’m feeling courteous today.

If you’re trying to emulate the badge system we have here, I think you’ve got the wrong mod installed.

You say you have “Stars And Badges (aka stars)”, the actual mod we have here is called “Show Multiple Badges (AKA Stars)”, and the link is here.

You’ll have to hack it around a bit, it’s an older mod, but there’s a push in the right direction.

Read full topic
